content:
Greetings! This is my research page.
I’m a machine learning researcher at CSIRO’s Data61.
I obtained my PhD working with Prof Wray Butine and Dr Lan Du and then worked as a postdoc researcher working Prof Dinh Phung at Monash University.
I’m interested in the areas of machine learning robustness and generalisation, optimal transport, and Bayesian modelling and inference, in the context of deep learning.
üèÜ Our paper led by Vy Vo won Best Student Paper - Reseach at KDD 2023 (1 out of 1416).

title: He Zhao
